description: Removes a user from a permission group.

parameters.name: permissionGroupId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the permission group.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the user.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A token that ensures idempotency. This token expires in 10 minutes. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: statusCode
nested_items.description: The returned status code of the response.
